attributes.action: remove VAT on energy efficient products, or to ban non-similar products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By removing the VAT on energy efficient products, this would produce a tax incentive to encourage people to purchase such goods. Also by banning non-energy efficient products would reduce so called carbon emissions. 300 pounds (136 kilos for the legislation on old weights..) a year would be saved on EE light bulbs compared to incandescent ones!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
